          <title>
            <string language="it">Addome - donna</string>
            <string language="en">Abdomen - woman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abdomen - Frau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Abdomen - femme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Abdômen - mulher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοιλία - γυναίκα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Abdomen - mujer</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Riesci a mettere i nomi giusti sui vari organi?</string>
            <string language="en">Do you manage to put the right names on the different organs?</string>
          </description>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Handhaben Sie, die rechten Namen auf die 
unterschiedlichen Organe zu setzen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parvenez-vous à mettre les bons noms sur les 
différents organes ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você controla pôr os nomes direitos sobre os 
órgãos diferentes?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατορθώνετε να βάλετε τα σωστά ονόματα στα 
διαφορετικά όργανα;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Usted maneja poner los nombres derechos en los 
diversos órganos?</string>
          </description>
        </general>
